name: sg
description: This is a rhythm game created as part of the Serious Games course at Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt.

scripts.postinstall: cd app && npm i && cd .. && npm i -g generate-react-cli
scripts.start: concurrently -n app,web,api-doc "cd app && npm start" "cd web && serve" "npm run api-doc-viewer"
scripts.build: node scripts/generate-credits && cd app && npm run build
scripts.deploy: scp -r app/build/ licht:~/beatfork_play && ssh licht "sudo rsync beatfork_play/ /var/www/html/beatfork/ -r --delete && rm -r beatfork_play"
scripts.bd: npm run build && npm run deploy
